attributes.action: Investigate the establishment of a secure national DNA database with the aim of eliminating the growing crime of identity theft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provision of a DNA sample should be an option for anyone concerned with being able to positively prove there identity without documents. It could also be a requirement for holding a UK passport or for entry into the UK.
This might also significantly reduce the often disproportionate cost to the UK taxpayer of impotent police and judicial procedures, as well as assisting in providing a positive I/D in hospitals and in the tracking of criminals and illegal immigrants.
Despite the 'Big Brother' implications, properly researched and implemented the advantages for the honest citizen and for quality of life for the community, could easily outweigh the negatives. Let's at least check it out!
